name: minio
description: Minio is an object storage server compatible with Amazon S3. It is best suited for storign unstructured data such as photos, videos, log files, backups and container / VM images.
postInstallNotes:
Minio DC/OS service has been successfully installed.
See https://docs.minio.io/ for documentation.
postUninstallNotes: Minio DC/OS service has been successfully uninstalled and will no longer run.
